thread.section_title: Dolphin Suites - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Kampala, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Always a pleasure to return to the Hotel
thread.title_full: Always a pleasure to return to the Hotel - Review of Dolphin Suites, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: bferna29
title: Always a pleasure to return to the Hotel
text:
The surrounding in a residential area is perfect as it is quiet and easy to travel to and from the City Centre. I stayed on the bottom level overlooking the gardens and the pool which was very relaxing. As always the staff are extremely helpful and friendly.
The menu has not changed, but the meals I had were excellent, from Hamburgers to Indian Cuisine and local fish, all was perfectly prepared.
